Class InfoFile

  • java.lang.Object
    • InfoFile

  • public class InfoFile
extends java.lang.Object

    Info File Class

    This class contains all method that correspond to the proper option from InfoOption. All method are executed at Infoff main.

    Since:
    March 24-2018
    Version:
    1.0
    Author:
    Theologos Tsolovikos
    See Also:
    File, FileWriter, IOException, Writer, Files, Paths, BasicFileAttributes, FileTime, ArrayList, Scanner

    • Constructor Detail

      • InfoFile

        public InfoFile​(java.lang.String filename)
        Constructor

        It check if the filename is exist as file/folder then creates & initialize all variable that needs. Otherwise it catch an exception {@link InfoMessages.fileError()}.

        Parameters:
        filename - It's the name or the path of the file that user gave as input.

      • noteDetails

        public void noteDetails​()
                 throws java.io.IOException

        public void notedetails() Method

        It will store all details from the given file into new text file and ask user for a name for new file.

        Throws:
        java.io.IOException
